title: Google Launches Five Free AI Training Programs To Empower Learners Worldwide
description: Google has introduced five free, flexible online AI training programs designed to help learners, professionals, educators, and entrepreneurs harness the power of artificial intelligence.

title: Countries, regulators and partners urge a collaborative approach to advance safe and equitable AI in health
description: Delegates from regulatory authorities, academia, and industry convened at AIRIS 2025 in Incheon, Republic of Korea, to advance the safe, ethical, and equitable use of artificial intelligence in health. Co-hosted by WHO and the Ministry of Food and Drug Safety, the symposium was held under the theme ‘Regulation for AI, Together for Tomorrow’.
content: Building on progress made at the AI Regulatory and International Symposium (AIRIS) in Seoul in 2024, the World Health Organization (WHO) and the Ministry of Food and Drug Safety (MFDS), Republic of Korea successfully co-hosted AIRIS 2025 in Incheon, ... [1678 chars]

title: Goldman Sachs says concerns on AI boom showing bubble
description: Amid the recent surge in artificial intelligence (AI) investments, the concerns were raised that the AI boom is beginning to show some bubble-like features such as rapid investment flows, high valuations, and speculative enthusiasm. However, the Goldman Sachs noted that the current situation differs fundamentally from past bubbles like the dot-com era.
content: New Delhi [India], October 24 (ANI): Amid the recent surge in artificial intelligence (AI) investments, concerns have been raised that the AI boom is beginning to show bubble-like features, such as rapid investment flows, high valuations, and specula... [2511 chars]

title: CrowdStrike CEO says AI will not kill software, it will actually make it stronger
description: CrowdStrike CEO George Kurtz addresses concerns that AI could make traditional software obsolete, arguing that artificial intelligence will instead bolster the software industry and drive new security needs.
content: There has been a long-running debate over whether artificial intelligence could render traditional software obsolete. This fear is rooted in AI’s growing ability to automate coding, development tasks, and even replace parts of the human workforce. Ho... [3155 chars]

title: Google Earth Uses Gemini AI To Answer Querries On Disasters Like Flood, Wildfires
description: Google is enhancing its Earth AI platform to help communities prepare for and respond to disasters using advanced geospatial artificial intelligence. The tools have already guided millions during emergencies, including the 2025 California wildfires, where alerts reached 15 million people.

title: SOGAGEM Accelerates Jewelry Digitalization Through AI Trade Platform
description: SEOUL, South Korea, Oct. 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Korean fashion jewelry company SOGAGEM Co., Ltd. is driving the digital transformation of the Namdaemun jewelry industry through its AI-powered online trade platform. By combining artificial intelligence (AI) and intellectual property (IP) management, the company is creating a new digital ecosystem for small jewelry manufacturers, leading the way in enhancing the global competitiveness of K-jewelry.
